name: epoch-converter
title: Epoch Converter
description: Get current epoch timestamps and convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable (ISO 8601) datetime strings.
author: vitalibo

commands.name: timestamp
commands.title: Get Current Timestamp
commands.description: Get current Unix timestamp in milliseconds and copy it to clipboard

commands.name: convert-timestamp
commands.title: Convert Timestamp to Datetime
commands.description: Convert a Unix timestamp to an ISO 8601 datetime format

commands.name: convert-datetime
commands.title: Convert Datetime to Timestamp
commands.description: Convert an ISO 8601 datetime to Unix timestamp milliseconds
